${modID}:EyeOfTheTotger.NAME: Eye Of The Totger
DESCRIPTIONS: Block at the end of each turn for each #yBinge you have.

${modID}:FallFromAmysGrace.NAME: Fall From Amy's Grace
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStrength also increases amount of #yPoison inflicted. NL Does not stack.

${modID}:GuzzleGut.NAME: Guzzle Gut
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPoison to ALL enemies each time you #yBinge.

${modID}:LiquidLaugh.NAME: Liquid Laugh
DESCRIPTIONS: #yPoison to ALL enemies each time you #yPurge.

${modID}:LoafForm.NAME: Loaf Form
DESCRIPTIONS: at the start of every turn.
